name: I Caught The Easter Bunny
description:
Happy Easter! Find Easter eggs in the beautiful woodlands, using your super cool egg-device-phone-thing?... but be warned, you're not alone!

Made in 2 days since I forgot it was Easter (very busy working on some exciting projects). Inspired by my other game, I caught Santa Claus. Stay tuned for more games!

-JR

Website: https://lunareffectdigital.wixsite.com/lunareffect
